documentation.text:
@title OwnershipTransferHelper
 @dev 用于帮助 JBC Token 合约转移协议合约 Owner 的辅助合约
 
 由于协议合约的 Owner 是 JBC Token 合约本身，而 JBC Token 合约没有调用协议合约的功能，
 这个辅助合约提供了一个解决方案：
 1. JBC Token Owner 部署此合约
 2. JBC Token Owner 调用此合约的 transferProtocolOwnership 函数
 3. 此合约会调用协议合约的 transferOwnership
 
 但是，由于协议 Owner 是 JBC Token 合约，而不是 JBC Token Owner，
 这个方案仍然无法直接工作。
 
 真正的解决方案是：需要先让 JBC Token 合约能够调用此合约，或者
 需要修改 JBC Token 合约以添加调用协议合约的功能。

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: caller is not the owner"

arguments.value: Ownable: caller is not the owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Ownable: caller is not the owner"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "This contract is not the protocol owner"

arguments.value: This contract is not the protocol owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "This contract is not the protocol owner"

documentation.text: @dev 检查协议 Owner 是否是此合约
@dev 检查协议 Owner 是否是 JBC Token 合约

JBC Token Owner \u90e8\u7f72\u6b64\u5408\u7ea6 2. JBC Token Owner \u8c03\u7528\u6b64\u5408\u7ea6\u7684 transferProtocolOwnership \u51fd\u6570 3. \u6b64\u5408\u7ea6\u4f1a\u8c03\u7528\u534f\u8bae\u5408\u7ea6\u7684 transferOwnership  \u4f46\u662f\uff0c\u7531\u4e8e\u534f\u8bae Owner \u662f JBC Token \u5408\u7ea6\uff0c\u800c\u4e0d\u662f JBC Token Owner\uff0c \u8fd9\u4e2a\u65b9\u6848\u4ecd\u7136\u65e0\u6cd5\u76f4\u63a5\u5de5\u4f5c\u3002  \u771f\u6b63\u7684\u89e3\u51b3\u65b9\u6848\u662f\uff1a\u9700\u8981\u5148\u8ba9 JBC Token \u5408\u7ea6\u80fd\u591f\u8c03\u7528\u6b64\u5408\u7ea6\uff0c\u6216\u8005 \u9700\u8981\u4fee\u6539 JBC Token \u5408\u7ea6\u4ee5\u6dfb\u52a0\u8c03\u7528\u534f\u8bae\u5408\u7ea6\u7684\u529f\u80fd\u3002","kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"OwnershipTransferHelper","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/OwnershipTransferHelper.sol":"IProtocol"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":1},"remappings":[],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/OwnershipTransferHelper.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8b639fd1d24bb85fb6f26e59bb62cdadd706c756b9a54e6947f92464a5f7dd82","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a2af000f923a7b8662851e9861552fc529395df7c9792a83a1e2c57ce7920b98","dweb:/ipfs/QmPeJUXEwGrjPtpsYHKwnEaQEBYQQS8XNoQT8rUjaRZWMS"]}},"version":1}
